TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridViewRow extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow implements class System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer, class System.Web.UI.INamingContainer
Public Class GridViewRow Inherits TableRow Implements IDataItemContainer
public ref class GridViewRow : System::Web::UI::WebControls::TableRow, System::Web::UI::IDataItemContainer
type GridViewRow = class inherit TableRow interface IDataItemContainer interface INamingContainer

summary.span: 表示 控件中的单个行。

span.span: Represents an individual row in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于表示控件中的单个行。 The class is used represent an individual row in a control. 控件中的每一行都有一个使用枚举的指定行类型。Each row in the control has a designated row type using the enumeration. 下表列出了不同的行类型。The following table lists the different row types. |行类型Row type|说明Description| |--------------|-----------------| |`DataRow`|控件中的数据行。A data row in the control.| |`EmptyDataRow`|控件中的空行。The empty row in the control. 如果该控件没有要显示的记录并且该模板不`null`是, 则会显示空行。The empty row is displayed when the control has no records to display and the template is not `null`.| |`Footer`|控件中的脚注行。The footer row in the control.| |`Header`|控件中的标题行。The header row in the control.| |`Pager`|控件中的页导航行。A pager row in the control.| |`Separator`|控件中的分隔行。A separator row in the control.| 若要确定对象的行类型, 请使用属性。To determine the row type of a object, use the property. 对象还具有与之关联的状态。A object also has a state associated with it. 该状态可以是下表中的值的按位组合。The state can be a bitwise combination of the values in the following table. |状态值State value|说明Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |`Alternate`|对象是控件中的替换行。 The object is an alternate row in the control.| |`Edit`|对象处于编辑模式。The object is in edit mode.| |`Normal`|对象处于其正常 (默认) 状态。The object is in its normal (default) state.| |`Selected`|对象处于选定状态。The object is selected.| 若要确定对象的状态, 请使用属性。To determine the state of a object, use the property. 控件将其所有数据行存储在集合中。 The control stores all of its data rows in the collection. 若要确定 集合中对象的索引, 请使用属性。To determine the index of a object in the collection, use the property. 您可以通过 使用属性访问绑定到对象的基础数据对象的属性。You can access the properties of the underlying data object that is bound to the object by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 属性仅在控件的事件期间和之后可用。 The property is available only during and after the event of a control. 若要确定基础数据源中数据对象的索引, 请使用属性。To determine the index of the data object in the underlying data source, use the property. 可以通过 使用属性访问对象的各个单元。You can access the individual cells of the object by using the property. 如果单元格包含其他控件, 则可以通过使用单元格的集合从单元格中检索控件。If a cell contains other controls, you can retrieve a control from the cell by using the collection of the cell. 如果控件 具有指定的, 则还可以使用单元格的方法来查找控件。You can also use the method of the cell to find the control, if the control has an specified. 若要从字段列或自动生成的字段列中检索字段值, 请使用单元的属性。To retrieve a field value from a field column or an automatically generated field column, use the property of the cell. 若要从字段值绑定到控件的其他字段列类型检索字段值, 请先从相应的单元格中检索控件, 然后访问控件的相应属性。To retrieve a field value from other field column types where the field value is bound to a control, first retrieve the control from the appropriate cell and then access the appropriate property of the control. > [!NOTE] > 在不将值绑定到控件的属性的情况下, 可以直接在字段列中使用数据绑定表达式。It is possible to use a data-binding expression directly in a field column without binding the value to a property of a control. 在这种情况下, 字段值自动放置在控件中。In this case, the field value is automatically placed in a control. 若要检索字段值, 必须首先从相应的单元格中检索控件, 并使用其属性。To retrieve the field value, you must first retrieve the control from the appropriate cell and then use its property. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表, 请参见构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用对象从控件中的单元格检索字段值, 然后在页面上显示值。The following example demonstrates how to use a object to retrieve a field value from a cell in the control and then display the value on the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRow#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRow/CS/gridviewrowcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRow#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRow/VB/gridviewrowvb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何使用对象检索在字段列的编辑项模板中声明的控件。The following example demonstrates how to use a object to retrieve a control declared in a field column's edit item template. 然后, 将文本框的值传递到控件以便在数据源中进行更新。The value of the text box is then passed to a control for updating in the data source. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowFindControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowFindControl/CS/gridviewrowfindcontrolcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowFindControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowFindControl/VB/gridviewrowfindcontrolvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Script Exploits Overview

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可访问对象绑定到的基础数据对象的属性。 Use the property to access the properties of the underlying data object to which the object is bound. 属性仅在控件的事件期间和之后可用。 The property is only available during and after the event of a control. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅适用于数据行。This property applies only to data rows. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来检索字段值。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to retrieve a field value. 然后, 使用该值预先选择控件中的某一项, 当该行处于编辑模式时。The value is then used to pre-select an item in a control displayed when a row is in edit mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowDataItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowDataItem/CS/gridviewrowdataitemcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowDataItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowDataItem/VB/gridviewrowdataitemvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets the state of the object.
A bitwise combination of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定对象的状态。 Use the property to determine the state of the object. 该状态可以是下表中的值的按位组合:The state can be a bitwise combination of the values in the following table: |状态值Status value|说明Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`DataControlRowState.Alternate`|对象是控件中的替换行。 The object is an alternate row in the control.| |`DataControlRowState.Edit`|对象处于编辑模式。The object is in edit mode.| |`DataControlRowState.Normal`|对象处于其正常 (默认) 状态。The object is in its normal (default) state.| |`DataControlRowState.Selected`|对象处于选定状态。The object is selected.| 此属性通常用于在执行操作之前确定行的状态。This property is commonly used to determine the state of a row before performing an operation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定行是处于编辑模式还是处于选中状态。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether a row is in edit mode or is selected. 如果用户在控件处于编辑模式时选择了不同的行 , 控件将退出编辑模式。If the user selects a different row while the control is in edit mode, the control exits edit mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowRowState#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowRowState/CS/gridviewrowrowstatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowRowState#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowRowState/VB/gridviewrowrowstatevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取 对象的行类型。

span.span: Gets the row type of the object.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可确定对象表示的行的类型。 Use the property to determine the type of row that the object represents. 下表使用枚举列出了不同的行类型值。The following table lists the different row type values using the enumeration. |行类型Row type|说明Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||控件中的数据行。A data row in the control.| ||控件中的脚注行。The footer row in the control.| ||控件中的标题行。The header row in the control.| ||控件中的空行。The empty row in the control. 当控件没有任何要显示的记录时, 将显示空行。The empty row is displayed when control does not have any records to display.| ||控件中的页导航行。A pager row in the control.| ||控件中的分隔行。A separator row in the control.| 此属性通常用于在执行操作之前确定行的类型。This property is commonly used to determine a row's type before performing an operation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定所创建的行是否为脚注行。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether a row being created is a footer row. 如果行是一个页脚行, 则该列的总和的值将更新到页脚行中。If the row is a footer row, the value for the sum of the column is updated into the footer row. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowRowType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowRowType/CS/gridviewrowrowtypecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowRowType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowRowType/VB/gridviewrowrowtypevb.aspx#1)]
